movies.title: Grendizer, Getter Robo G, Great Mazinger: Decisive Battle! Great Sea Beast
movies.originalTitle: Gurendaizâ, Gettâ Robo jî, Gurêto Majingâ - Kessen! Daikaijû
movies.plot: When a mysterious gigantic monster, called Dragosaur, appears from the depth of the oceans and threatens the world, a team of super-robots from Japan is activated and sent out to defeat it: Grendizer, The Great Mazinger and Getter G.
movies.simplePlot: When a mysterious gigantic monster, called Dragosaur, appears from the depth of the oceans and threatens the world, a team of super-robots from Japan is activated and sent out to defeat it: Grendizer, The Great Mazinger and Getter G.

biography.bio: Hiroya Ishimaru was born on February 12, 1946 in Sendai, Japan as Shinji Ishimaru. He is an actor, known for Tokyo Godfathers (2003), Cyber City Oedo 808 (1990) and Tekken 5 (2004).
biography.name: Hiroya Ishimaru

biography.bio: Akira Kamiya was born on September 18, 1946 in Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Fist of the North Star (1984), Lamu (1981) and Conan le detective (1996).
biography.name: Akira Kamiya

biography.bio: Minori Matsushima was born on December 1, 1940. She is an actress, known for Candy (1976), Le merveilleux voyage de Nils Holgersson au pays des oies sauvages (1980) and Animal Treasure Island (1971).
biography.name: Minori Matsushima

biography.bio: Kei'ichi Noda was born on September 14, 1943 in Yamaguchi, Japan as Seiji Yamane. He is an actor, known for Capitaine Flam (1978), Robot Detective (1973) and Sanbiki no ossan (2014).
biography.name: Kei'ichi Noda

biography.bio: Kôsei Tomita was born on February 4, 1936 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Metropolis (2001), Beast King GoLion (1981) and Sherlock Hound (1984).
biography.name: Kôsei Tomita

biography.placeOfBirth: Anshan, Fengtian, Manchukuo [now Anshan, Liaoning, China]
biography.bio: Kei Tomiyama was born on October 31, 1938 in Anshan, Fengtian, Manchukuo as Kunichika Tomiyama. He was an actor, known for Uchû senkan Yamato (1974), Space Cruiser Yamato 2 (1978) and Speed Racer (1967). He died on September 25, 1995 in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Kei Tomiyama

biography.bio: Keaton Yamada was born on October 25, 1945 in Hokkaido, Japan as Shunji Yamada. He is an actor, known for Lady Oscar (1979), Chôdenji robo Kon-Batorâ bui (1976) and Android Kikaider: The Animation (2000).
biography.name: Keaton Yamada

biography.bio: Jôji Yanami was born on August 30, 1931 in Tokyo Prefecture, Japan as Shigemitsu Shirato. He is an actor, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984).
biography.name: Jôji Yanami

biography.bio: Rihoko Yoshida was born on January 24, 1949 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Meg la sorcière (1974), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Lady Oscar (1979).
biography.name: Rihoko Yoshida
